content:
I'm wrapping up cargo-add's port to cargo when I realized I should probably support namespaced and weak features out of the gate since cargo master does.

Whether to reuse or make sure I'm compatible with the syntax, where can I find the code?

The reason this matters is that cargo-add allows modifying an existing dependency which can include turning an optional dependency into a required dependency. When this happens, we remove the activations of the optional dependency from the dependency table.

This would then be reused by cargo rm.
